abstract: The device verification value you use to verify whether the transaction belongs to the device.
overview:
## Discussion

Whenever StoreKit returns a verified transaction, the transaction is valid for the device. To perform your own verification, compute the device verification hash as follows:

Compare the value you calculated to the transaction’s [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Transaction/deviceVerification] value. If the values match, the transaction is valid for the device. Otherwise, the verification fails and the transaction isn’t valid for the device.
